comments:
Driver:  WTP 2.0 RC3

In a new workspace, create an Axi2 client with:

http://www.xmethods.net/sd/2001/CurrencyExchangeService.wsdl
or
http://www.xmethods.net/sd/2001/TemperatureService.wsdl
or
http://services.xmethods.net/soap/urn:xmethods-delayed-quotes.wsdl

Resulted in either:

Exception occurred while code generation for WSDL null
    java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:64)
    at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
    at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:615)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.consumption.core.utils.WSDL2JavaGenerator.getAxisService(WSDL2JavaGenerator.java:379)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.consumption.core.command.Axis2ClientCodegenCommand.execute(Axis2ClientCodegenCommand.java:89)
    at org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.core.fragment.CommandFragmentEngine.runCommand(CommandFragmentEngine.java:418)

or the wizard just finishes without doing anything.

The same problem occurs when creating top-down Axis2 Web service.

However, with some other WSDL files, Axis2 skeleton and client are fine:

http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/community/tutorials/TopDownAxis2WebService/code/AreaService.wsdl

The wsdls that listed there are all encoded wsdls. Axis2 does not support this. There should be a cause by in the trace saying that endoded wsdls are not supported. 

As a alternative there we can use, 

http://www.webservicex.net/stockquote.asmx?wsdl
http://www.webservicex.net/CurrencyConvertor.asmx?wsdl

to test the scenarios which are literal 

Lahiru

Hi Kathy, 

I guess you were able to succeed with the wsdls that I have reported to this issue. Since that we all know that this feature is not supported by Axis2, we can include it in the documentation. Please verify this and if possible close this issue. 

Thanks 

Lahiru
